item.title: Hedy Lamarr
item.description: Hey there, This month, ONU Femmes France celebrates a fascinating woman. We all know her face, we’ve seen her since childhood, but few of us know her name. I give you: Hedy Lamarr, the woman who inspired Disney’s Snow White. She was an Austrian actress and movie producer, and was considered the most beautiful woman. But the reason I want to talk about her today is that she was also an inventor.

item.title: Ada Lovelace Day
item.description: Hello, Last Tuesday, October 12, was Ada Lovelace Day. Many other artists shared their illustration of Ada Lovelace, as well as a short biography of her. I wanted to share mine as well. As many said before me, she was a Mathematician and the first person ever to design a computer program when computers didn’t even exist, and at a time where it was often believed that women were only interested in “futile things”.
